widget.name: Dynamic Enumerations
widget.description: This widget is used to create Enumerations from strings and allows creating new enumerations on fly during runtime instead of using Mendix Enumerations or associations

property.caption: Selector Mode on
property.description: Set true to make widget selector mode, false use in creator mode.

property.caption: Source
property.description: String attribute to hold the options available for enumeration

property.caption: Target
property.description: Attribute to hold the selected option string

property.caption: Caption for Selector
property.description: Caption for selector can be empty.
